About Adaptiva

Adaptiva was founded with a vision to deliver cost-effective ways for enterprises to scale their IT initiatives by intelligently doing more with the resources they already own.

Make an impact

We make products that runs on millions of machines and impacts lives on a daily basis, and our open company structure ensures that your ideas are heard.

Join Adaptiva

Grow your career

Do the best work of your life and learn from some of the brightest minds in technology. Solve real-world problems in cutting-edge areas from big data to software distribution.

Join Adaptiva

Work on a great team

Tackle some of the world’s toughest scalability challenges — together. Work with good people who care about the success of our customers, our company, and each other.

Join Adaptiva
